1.content:
Daniel Danzig had a pretty decent life. He had a beautiful wife, 2 strong lads to uphold the family name and a cute little girl that could melt even the frostiest heart known to exist. He had an alright job that paid him decently but- in less colourful terms than he would use- he thought that the rest of his colleagues were idiots. Even so, his life was pretty idyllic despite the mundanities that made up His regular life.

One warm, summer’s day however, everything that made Daniel and his family’s life tranquil was shaken up when a mysterious package was found on their doorstep. The package was opened and revealed:
1.title: Danzig Diaries: Entry #1

info.brief_description: The story of Daniel Danzig and his family
info.description: Characters are Daniel Danzig his wife Denise and their their two sons Dylan Dominic and their daughter and their daughter Denise
